summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to child care services; authorizing the Department of Administrative Services to enter into an agreement for the provision of child care services in the Alaska Building; authorizing the Department of Housing and Human Services to enter into an agreement to assist in the provision of quality child care for employees of The City of Seattle and for the operation of a model employee-assisted child care center; and making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the members of the City Council.
